content: A `Spinner` is used to indicate an unspecified wait time. It should have an accessible `label` or `aria-label`. It supports different `sizes` and `colors`.
The Spinner has multiple visual `variants`, including `default`, `simple`, `gradient`, `wave`, `dots`, and `spinner`.
Key stylable slots are `base`, `wrapper`, `circle1`, `circle2` (for the default spinner), and `label`.
